sentences.en: If this is an ellipse around the Earth, then this would be perigee and this would be apogee.
sentences.cn: 如果这是一个围绕,地球的椭圆形轨道,那么这是近地点，这是远地点。

sentences.en: The lowest point (perigee) of the ISS was 347 kilometers and the highest point (apogee) of the SH-7 orbit was 336 kilometers.
sentences.cn: 国际空间站的最低点(近地点)是347公里，神舟七号的最高点(远地点)为336公里。

sentences.en: The Moon reaches its absolute perigee once a year.
sentences.cn: 月球每年有一次达到它的绝对近地点.

sentences.en: We know the period, we know where apogee is, we know where perigee is, - we know the orbital period-- anything we want to know.
sentences.cn: 知道周期，知道远地点，和近地点在哪里，知道轨道周期-,知道了想知道的一切。

trans.tran_en: the point in its orbit around the earth when the moon or an artificial satellite is nearest the earth
